#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int m,n;
    scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
    while(true)
    {
        if(m==0&&n==0) break;
        int c=0,ct=0;
        while(m&&n)
        {
            int a=m%10;
            int b=n%10;
            m/=10;
            n/=10;
            c=(c+a+b)/10;
            if(c) ct++;
        }
        while(m)
        {
            int a=m%10;
            m/=10;
            c=(c+a)/10;
            if(c) ct++;
        }
        while(n)
        {
            int b=n%10;
            n/=10;
            c=(c+b)/10;
            if(c) ct++;
        }
        if(ct)
        {
            if(ct==1) printf("1 carry operation.\n");
            else printf("%d carry operations.\n",ct);
        }
        else
        {
            printf("No carry operation.\n");
        }
        scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
    }
}
